The aim of this review is to summarize our knowledge about common concept relating to adaptogenic plants used as officinal medical preparations in the USSR/Russian and in traditional Chinese medicine (TCM), Ayurveda, Kampo, and other traditional medical systems (TMS) and alternative medical systems, and to analyze how such preparations have been studied scientifically. This provides a basis for assessing the use of adaptogens in the treatment of stress‐induced and aging‐related disorders.
